        public E associationStorage(AssociationStorageType associationStorage)

        Specifies how associations of the configured entity should be persisted.
        Specified by:
        associationStorage in interface DocumentStoreEntityContext<E extends DocumentStoreEntityContext<E,P>,P extends DocumentStorePropertyContext<E,P>>
        Parameters:
        associationStorage - the association storage type to be used when not configured on the property level. Overrides any settings on the global level.
        Returns:
        this context, allowing for further fluent API invocations
